p:
We used the search terms “Basic reproduction number” or “R 0” AND “chikungunya” to identify published articles from Google Scholar and PubMed. We identified 11 articles describing estimated R 0 of CHIKV from outbreak data during 2000–2019. We found 5 articles on outbreaks in Africa, all on La Réunion (
3 ,
5 –
8 ); 1 on an outbreak in Cambodia (
1 ); 2 on outbreaks in Italy (
9 ,
10 ); and 3 on outbreaks in the Americas (
11 ,
12 ; N. Báez-Hernández et al. unpub. data, https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/122556v1).
